name: Climbing Errand
description:
A short 3D platformer made for a class focusing on the level design. Due to that focus and time constraints the game does not have an actual ending or menu. 

It's playable via keyboard, using WASD to move, Shift to run, Space to jump and the mouse to control the camera. 

If you want to read more about the design process for this project or view some of my other projects, please check out my portfolio.
